name: Aglide
long_description:
Aglide give companies Okta-level access control for any app. All you need to connect an account is its username and password.

Companies use Aglide as their sole SSO, or connect it to their existing identity provider - letting them avoid the SSO tax, and manage access to accounts that donâ€™t support SAML, like social media services.
one_liner: Natively connect any app to your SSO.
